#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

void check(int a){
	assert(0<=a and a<=1000000);
}
int main()
{
	int a, b,c, d, e, f;
	cin >> a >> b >> c >> d >> e >> f;
	check(a);
	check(b);
	check(c);
	check(d);
	check(e);
	check(f);
	string ans;
	if(a + b == d + e and b + c == e + f) ans = "Losing\n";
	else ans = "Winning\n";
	cout << ans;
	return 0;
}
